contents.text: Welcome to Art dot com in the East Bay, your destination for art prints, custom framing, and home décor at great prices.
Press 1 for shopping art prints, framed art, and home décor items.
Press 1 for art prints and home décor items.
Please hold while we connect you with our art prints and home décor specialists.

navigationGoals: Order a set of minimalist art prints for my office wall.
I’m looking for a patriotic art print for my living room and want to apply my veteran discount.
I’d like to order a high-resolution giclée print with ICC profile matching and explore Pantone-aligned home décor options.
I need help choosing an art print and matching décor piece for my living room.
I'd like to buy a physics-themed art print for my dorm room.

contents.text: Press 2 to browse original art and limited editions.
Please hold while we connect you with our original art and limited editions team.

navigationGoals: Explore limited-edition original pieces from local artists.
I want to browse limited-edition artwork by veteran artists.
I want to browse limited-edition originals, check edition size data, and verify provenance certificates.
I’d like information on purchasing a limited-edition artwork and its availability.
I'm looking to browse limited-edition original artwork for my apartment decor.

contents.text: Press 2 for custom framing and canvas transfer services.
Press 1 to learn about our custom framing options.
Please hold while we connect you with our custom framing experts.

navigationGoals: Get a quote and options for framing a 16×20 award certificate.
I need custom framing for my military service medals display.
I need to discuss custom framing specs, including precise aperture dimensions and UV-protective glazing options.
I have a family photo I want framed and need guidance on frame styles and materials.
I need information on custom framing options for my research poster.

contents.text: Please hold while we connect you with our canvas transfer team.

navigationGoals: Arrange a canvas transfer of a family portrait onto stretched canvas.
I want to transfer a group photo from my service onto canvas.
I’m interested in canvas transfer services, specifically the substrate priming method and finishing varnish types.
I want to transfer an old photograph onto canvas and need details on the process and cost.
I'd like to have a lab group photo transferred onto canvas as a gift for my advisor.
